name: Last.fm Paint it Black v.2 Mod-of-a-Mod: Grey/Blue
description:
Tweaked the Grey and Olive mod to fit my tastes a little more, all I did was lighten the greys and switch the olives to blue.  But I figured some might appreciate having another color option out there.

Original Paint it Black style: http://userstyles.org/styles/8671
Grey and Olive mod: http://userstyles.org/styles/8892
